name: Apple Mail Message
summary: Learn about .EMLX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open and view .EMLX files with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: EMLX files created by Apple Mail are not meant to be manually opened. However, if you encounter an EMLX file, you can double-click it to open it as long as Apple Mail is set as the default program.

Since the EMLX files are saved in plain text, you can also open the file to view the contents in a text editor, such as Apple TextEdit or Microsoft Notepad. You may need to change the .emlx file extension to .txt.

description: An EMLX file contains an individual email message created by Apple Mail, an email program bundled with macOS. It stores the contents of a message, which includes the subject, sender, and recipient. EMLX files do not store email attachments, only the message information.
